comment:
* Contains a view of SMS conversations (also referred to as threads). This is similar to * {@link Threads}, but only includes SMS messages and columns relevant to SMS * conversations. *

* Note that this view ignores any information about MMS messages, it is a * view of conversations as if MMS messages did not exist at all. This means that all * relevant information, such as snippets and message count, will ignore any MMS messages * that might be in the same thread through other views and present only data based on the * SMS messages in that thread.

variables.name: CONTENT_URI
variables.comment: * The {@code content://} style URL for this table.

variables.name: DEFAULT_SORT_ORDER
variables.comment: * The default sort order for this table.

variables.name: SNIPPET
variables.comment:
* The first 45 characters of the body of the most recent message. *

Type: TEXT

variables.name: MESSAGE_COUNT
variables.comment:
* The number of messages in the conversation. *

Type: INTEGER
